resources.string: Pressing confirm will cancel your dose of this medication for today and it will not be possible to reverse it. Do you want to confirm the cancellation?
This page contains all the medicines you will need to take today. If you have registered a treatment and it is not here, it is not scheduled for today.
is running out, if you have purchased more pills, report it using the "replacement" button
This page contains all the medicines you have registered. If the medicine is a tablet, you can control its quantity, being notified when it is close to running out.
Pressing delete will erase your entire treatment with this medicine and it will not be possible to reverse it. Do you want to confirm the deletion?
On this page are all the reminders that will ring daily/weekly/on a specific day during your treatment. Here you can edit time and quantity, as well as delete a usage time.
You sure do you want delete this elderly?
Choose the elderly person who will take the medicine
You do not have seniors registered on the App, please register one to continue.
Enter how many hours you take this medicine
How many hours do you repeat the dose of this treatment? Type in the white field and press next.
How often do you take this medicine
Choose the option that corresponds to your case. Do you repeat the dose every day, at intervals of days (every other day) or on specific days (every Monday, Wednesday and Friday)?
How often do you take this medicine per day
More than three times per day
How many times do you take this medicine during the day? 1 time, 2 times, more than 3 times or every x hours (8 every 8 hours)
When do you need to take the next dose?
How many times do you take this medicine during the day? 1 time, 2 times, more than 3 times or every x hours (8 every 8 hours)
On which day(s) will you take this medication?
What days of the week do you use this medicine? Click on the day that corresponds to your case, it will change color. You can select more than one day and when you are done, click next.
Enter how many times you take this medicine per day
Enter in the white field how many times you take this medicine per day.
Take a photo of the packaging EXAMPLE:
Take a photo of the pill EXAMPLE:
Don\'t want to take a photo of the medicine? Click here!
Click on the camera in the center to take a photo of the medicine box
Click on the example photo and take a photo of your medicine packaging. For example: photo of the pills.
Click on the example photo and take a photo of your medicine box.
Do you want to set a refill reminder for your medicine?
How many pills do you want to be notified with?
If you want to be notified when your medicine is running low, you can enter how many pills you still have and how many you want to be notified with. If you dont want to, click skip.
Enter the name of the medicine
You have already registered a medicine with this number, choose another one!
Select the time of the first dose

On this page you must click on the time, it will open your android clock and you must define the time you should take the medicine. Remember to pay attention to selecting the time shift (AM/PM). You must also select the dose quantity (1 tablet/30 drops) by clicking select quantity.
Click confirm to permanently delete your account, are you sure?
What type of medicine are you taking? Are they pills? Are they in drops? or powder? Select the button that corresponds to your case
